WebPageTest Homepage Documentation
Menu

    Welcome to WebPageTest

    WebPageTest is a web performance tool providing deep diagnostic information about how a page performs under a variety of conditions.

    Each test can be run from different locations around the world, on real browsers, over any number of customizable network conditions.

    Get started →

    Understanding Your Results

    WebPageTest.org is the freely available public instance of WebPageTest that you can use to drive your testing.

    Let's dive in →

    Using the API

    WebPageTest offers a rich API that can be used to programmatically run tests and retrieve test results so that you can incorporate WebPageTest into your existing workflows and continuous integration environments.

    Learn about the API →
